Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: I think everything here is covered by the work in FAB-498. Will ask Jason to chime in.

Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: Yes, I'd agree, this is covered by FAB-498. This addresses the machinery necessary to do all of the above. For specific orderer processes (like sbft vs kafka) the actual config required will vary, and the specific implementations are pending.

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: Cannot move to graveyard as sub-tasks cannot be moved to epics, so will mark it as done to remove it from view.
